title: ControlTest
description: Schema for describing how a control is tested in a SOX/ICFR environment.

id.description: Unique identifier for the control test (e.g., 'TP-001').

controlId.description: Which control this test plan applies to.

name.description: Name or summary of the test plan.

testFrequency.description: How often the test is performed.

testAttributes.description: Key steps or attributes tested (e.g., sample review, sign-off evidence).

iucTestAttributes.description: Procedures specifically related to verifying IUC completeness/accuracy.

status.description: Current status of the test plan.
